notes: It's part of the [[World Task]] [[A Pirate's Death to Me]]. Looks the same as a [[Rat]].
name: Ghost Rat
behaviour: They run very fast and make holes in lowest floor of the Spectral Ship.
location: Lowest deck of the Spectral Ship
strategy: Use a [[Ghost Duster]] on them. It will be helpful to use a [[Dwarven Ring|Dwarven]] or [[Stealth Ring]] and [[Haste]] because they can make you drunk and they are very fast, but they are not immune to [[Invisibility]]. A [[Stealth Ring]] is preferable because they will not run away from you, making them easier to catch.
